    Integrating Banksy with other packages

    integrating-pkgs.Rmd

    This article describes integration of Banksy with two other packages used for single-cell and spatial transcriptomic analyses, Seurat and Giotto.

    library(Banksy)

expr <- as.matrix(readRDS(system.file('/extdata/expression.rds', package = 'Banksy')))
locs <- readRDS(system.file('/extdata/locations.rds', package = 'Banksy'))
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = expr,
                     cell.locs = locs)
bank <- NormalizeBanksy(bank)
bank <- ComputeBanksy(bank)
bank <- ScaleBanksy(bank)
joint <- getBanksyMatrix(bank)

    Developed by Vipul Singhal, Joseph Lee.

    Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
